meanings.definition: The production of spores of one kind only.
meanings.sent1: Homospories are when only one type of spore is produced.
meanings.sent2: In homospories, spores of the same kind are created exclusively.
meanings.sent3: The garden was full of homospories, with all the spores looking identical.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a field of homospories, each thought a spore of the same kind.
meanings.sent5: The homospories in the lab under the microscope revealed their uniformity.

meanings.definition: The condition of having spores of one kind only.
meanings.sent1: The plant's homospories meant it only had one type of spore.
meanings.sent2: Homospories in fungi indicate a singular spore type condition.
meanings.sent3: The forest was a sea of homospories, each tree releasing the same spores.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps was a homospories of rare and unique designs.
meanings.sent5: The homospories of the bacteria culture showed a lack of diversity in spore types.
